name: part_008
file: tmp_【３D】ライブも企画も！誕生日祭だーー！！！！【 #大神ミオ誕生日 】 [ChMwx4yeI3g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio, Nekomata Okayu, and Oozora Subaru discuss performing a song for Mio's birthday.
Ookami Mio performs her original song 'Sashimio' with Okayu and Subaru as back-dancers and supporting vocals.
The three performers catch their breath and discuss the song after the performance.

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughter)

subtitles.original: えー！今の出し方なの、それは！？
subtitles.english: Ehh! Is that how you're introducing it!?

subtitles.original: そうなの？もう発表しちゃうの？
subtitles.english: Really? You're announcing it now?

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。だからちょっとね、今ちょっと歌っちゃわない？
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's right. So, why don't we sing it right now?

subtitles.original: そんなノリで！？
subtitles.english: With that kind of vibe!?

subtitles.original: ま、でもやっちゃいますかね、ここはね。
subtitles.english: Well, I guess we're doing it then.

subtitles.original: 猫先生。
subtitles.english: Neko-sensei.

subtitles.original: 先生方に、うん。頑張ってもらって。
subtitles.english: Let's do our best, Senseis.

subtitles.original: 僕たちにかかればね、いけますよ。このぐらいね。
subtitles.english: If it's us, we can handle it. This much.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします、先生方。
subtitles.english: Please, Senseis.

subtitles.original: まあまあ、君誕生日だもんね。
subtitles.english: Well, it is your birthday after all.

subtitles.original: あ、そうなんです。誕生日なんです！
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right! It is my birthday!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、しょうがないからセンターどうぞ。
subtitles.english: Then, I guess you take the center.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！じゃあセンターいただきます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! I'll take the center then.

subtitles.original: じゃあ僕こっち。
subtitles.english: I'll be over here.

subtitles.original: じゃあ私こっち。位置について。
subtitles.english: I'll be this way. Get in position.

subtitles.original: ポーズはこれ！
subtitles.english: The pose is... this!

subtitles.original: あれ？こっち？あれ？
subtitles.english: Wait, it's this way? Huh?

subtitles.original: ミオしゃ、あっちだよ。
subtitles.english: Miosha, it's that way.

subtitles.original: あっちだよ、あっちだったわ。
subtitles.english: It's that way, I got it wrong.

subtitles.original: それでは、オリジナル楽曲…
subtitles.english: Well then, here is my original song...

subtitles.original: 「さしみお」です！
subtitles.english: ...'Sashimio'!

subtitles.original:
さしみお feat.スバおか
作詞：立秋（歌詞改変：大空スバル、猫又おかゆ）
作曲・編曲：立秋
subtitles.english:
Sashimio feat. Suba-Oka
Lyrics: Tachivic (Lyrics rearrangement: Oozora Subaru, Nekomata Okayu)
Composition/Arrangement: Tachivic

subtitles.original: うちの名前は大神ミオ！
subtitles.english: My name is Ookami Mio!

subtitles.original: どこから来たのか あの山の麓！
subtitles.english: Where did I come from? The foot of that mountain!

subtitles.original: 本当は神社の巫女ねーちゃんだ！
subtitles.english: Actually, I'm a shrine maiden sister!

subtitles.original: みんなを幸せにするぞ！
subtitles.english: I'm going to make everyone happy!

subtitles.original: 今日も一日始まるみょ！
subtitles.english: Today starts too, myo!

subtitles.original: やみょ！
subtitles.english: Yamyo!

subtitles.original: おはみおーん！ってどうしたの？
subtitles.english: Ohomio-n! What's wrong?

subtitles.original: 泣いちゃったの？
subtitles.english: Are you crying?

subtitles.original: そっか、大変だったね。よしよし。
subtitles.english: I see, that was tough. There, there.

subtitles.original: ああー！これからはそんなことしたらダメだよ。
subtitles.english: Aah! You shouldn't do things like that from now on.

subtitles.original: 今日はおうちに帰ってうちとぼんじり食べよっか。
subtitles.english: Let's go home and eat Bonjiri together today.

subtitles.original: うち君のために頑張って作っちゃうよ。
subtitles.english: I'll work hard to make it for you!

subtitles.original: あえー！お兄ちゃん！
subtitles.english: Aie! Onii-chan!

subtitles.original: なんで他の女の子のことばかり見るの？
subtitles.english: Why are you always looking at other girls?

subtitles.original: たまにはうちだけ見てほしいみょ！
subtitles.english: I want you to only look at me sometimes, myo!

subtitles.original: べ、別にあんたのこと好きとかそういうのじゃないけど…
subtitles.english: It's not like I like you or anything like that...

subtitles.original: うちおかゆも好きっていうか、スバルも好きっていうか…
subtitles.english: I mean, I like Okayu too... or rather, I like Subaru too...

subtitles.original: つまりその、つまりその…
subtitles.english: In other words... in other words...

subtitles.original: お刺身ってこと！
subtitles.english: It means Sashimi!

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐ始まるよ
subtitles.english: It's about to start directly

subtitles.original: ミオの放送 待機 待機 待機
subtitles.english: Mio's broadcast Waiting Waiting Waiting

subtitles.original: そろそろお待たせかね
subtitles.english: It's almost time for what you've been waiting for

subtitles.original: 今日もいっぱい笑ってこ！
subtitles.english: Let's laugh a lot today too!

subtitles.original: セ、タイガァァァァ！
subtitles.english: SE-TAIGAAAA!

subtitles.original: あえー！うわ！夢か！ってもうこんな時間じゃん！
subtitles.english: Aie! Wah! Was it a dream? But it's already this time!

subtitles.original: 早く学校行かなくちゃ遅刻しちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: I have to hurry to school or I'll be late!

subtitles.original: 仕方がない、パンだけ口に入れてダッシュだ！
subtitles.english: Can't be helped, I'll just dash with bread in my mouth!

subtitles.original: 狼の脚力、なめんなよ！
subtitles.english: Don't underestimate a wolf's leg power!

subtitles.original: ああー、今日一時間目何だったっけな…
subtitles.english: Ah, what was first period today again...?

subtitles.original: 帰ったら何時から配信やろうかな…
subtitles.english: And what time should I start the stream tonight...?

subtitles.original: 大型企画もそろそろ組みたいしな…
subtitles.english: I want to start planning a big project soon, too...

subtitles.original: こうやってパンだけ口に入れて走ってると…
subtitles.english: Running with bread in my mouth like this...

subtitles.original: 何か素敵な出会いがあるかもしれないよね！
subtitles.english: ...maybe I'll have a fateful encounter!

subtitles.original: よくあるシチュエーションだと、交差点でドーン！って感じで…
subtitles.english: Like a common situation, bumping at an intersection...

subtitles.original: いや、でもうち巫女だし、何考えてんだろ！？
subtitles.english: Oh no, what am I thinking! I'm a shrine maiden after all!

subtitles.original: いたたたたっ！交差点！
subtitles.english: Ouch! An intersection!

subtitles.original: さしみお！
subtitles.english: Sashimio!

subtitles.original: わあー！お披露目できたー！
subtitles.english: Waaaah! We showed it!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい、ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: I'm so happy, thank you!

subtitles.original: いい曲に仕上がってたね！
subtitles.english: It turned out to be a really great song!

subtitles.original: いい曲だったよー！
subtitles.english: It was a good song!

subtitles.original: 嬉しかった。
subtitles.english: So glad.

subtitles.original: ね、頑張って歌詞考えてくれて本当にありがとね、二人共！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for working hard on the lyrics, both of you!

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとう！楽しかった！
subtitles.english: Likewise, thank you! It was fun!

subtitles.original: めちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was super fun!

subtitles.original: 立秋さんもね、こんなカオスな曲を…
subtitles.english: And Tachivic-sensei, for this chaotic song...

subtitles.original: まとめ上げてくださいましたね、立秋先生、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: ...for putting it all together! Thank you very much, Sensei!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: え、この歌はね、後ほど動画でも登場しますのでね。
subtitles.english: This song will appear in a video later as well.

subtitles.original: えー！そうなの！？
subtitles.english: Eh! Is that so!?

subtitles.original: 楽しみにしててください。
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ楽しみじゃん！楽しみー！
subtitles.english: I'm looking forward to it! Can't wait!

subtitles.original: あ、バックダンスもね…
subtitles.english: Ah, and the back-dancing...

subtitles.original: 初めてやったけど、めっちゃ楽しかったよね！
subtitles.english: ...was my first time, but it was really fun!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったー！
subtitles.english: It was fun!

subtitles.original: ここ、ここ！
subtitles.english: Right here, right here!
